title: Isekai Saikyou No Yome Desu Ga, Yoru No Tatakai Wa Ore No Hou Ga Tsuyoi You Desu ~Chiryaku O Ikashite Nariagaru Harem Senki~
alternative_title: Isekai Saikyou no Yome desu ga, Yoru no Tatakai wa Ore no Hou ga Tsuyoi you desu - Chiryaku wo Ikashite Nariagaru Harem Senki ; She's the Strongest Bride in Another World, but It Seems I'm Stronger in Night Battles ~A Harem Chronicle of Advancing Through Cunning Tactics~ ; 異世界最強の嫁ですが、夜の戦いは俺の方が強いようです~知略を活かして成り上がるハーレム戦記~
status: Isekai Saikyou no Yome desu ga, Yoru no Tatakai wa Ore no Hou ga Tsuyoi you desu - Chiryaku wo Ikashite Nariagaru Harem Senki ; She's the Strongest Bride in Another World, but It Seems I'm Stronger in Night Battles ~A Harem Chronicle of Advancing Through Cunning Tactics~ ; 異世界最強の嫁ですが、夜の戦いは俺の方が強いようです~知略を活かして成り上がるハーレム戦記~
description:
Description :
        Albert is reborn in another world and strives for a peaceful life in the Kingdom of Alexa. However, after being "kidnapped" by a Demon Goddess of war, Marida, he becomes a wanted man by the Kingdom!
Unable to return to his original country, Albert decides to live in the Empire of Eranzia. While enjoying intimate moments with the alluring body of Marida (but not just her!), he uses his previous worlds knowledge to achieve great accomplishments in governance, military affairs, strategy and of course..... Night-time battles!
A slightly risqué harem comedy begins!
